solution_line_template: The number of roses in the bunch is {roses_fraction} * {total_flowers} flowers = <<{roses_fraction}*{total_flowers}={num_roses}>>{num_roses} flowers
The total number of roses and tulips is {num_roses} flowers + {num_tulips} flowers = <<{num_roses}+{num_tulips}={roses_and_tulips}>>{roses_and_tulips} flowers
